lynxWelcome:
*Hello! I am Lynx!*
I was made with love by Lucas Gabriel (lucmsilva)!

*Before using, you will need to read the privacy policy (/privacy) to understand where your data goes when using this bot.*

Also, you can use /help to show the bot commands!
lynxHelp:
*Hello! I'm Lynx!*

I'm a simple bot made entirely from scratch in Telegraf and Node.js by Lucas Gabriel (lucmsilva).

*Profile photo/help:* [@monkeycatluna on ig](https://www.instagram.com/monkeycatluna/)

*Some commands to test:*
• */chatinfo* - send some information about the group
• */customize* - customize your pronouns (WIP)
• */dice* - send an emoji of a dice (random results)
• */furry* - check if you are a furry
• */gay* - check if you are gay
• */help* - send this message
• */privacy* - read the Privacy Policy
• */random* - pick a random number between 0-10
• */start* - start the bot
• */slot* - send an interactive emoji of a casino slot
• */userinfo* - send some information about yourself

*See my source code in my* [GitHub repository](https://github.com/lucmsilva651/lynx)*.*

Thanks to all users, testers, contributors, and others. Without you, perhaps this bot wouldn't be possible ❤️

*Special thanks to @givfnz2 for his many contributions to the bot!*
lynxPrivacy: Check out [this link](https://blog.eleu.me/posts/lynx-privacy-policy) to read the bot privacy policy.
kickingMyself: *Since you don't need me, I'll get out of here.*
noPermission: You don't have permissions to run this command.
botAdminOnly: This command is exclusive to the bot's general administrators. I can't disclose who they are, nor what this command does.
privateOnly: This command should be used only on private chats, and not on groups.
groupOnly: This command should be used only on groups, and not on private chats.
invalidId: Please enter a valid user ID.
banSuccess: User with ID `{userId}` has been banned.
banErr:
Could not ban the user. Please check if the ID is correct and if the bot has admin permissions.

{tgErr}
unBanSuccess: User with ID `{userId}` has been unbanned.
unBanErr:
Could not unban the user. Please check if the ID is correct and if the bot has admin permissions.

{tgErr}
isNtFurry: Aahhh. You are not a furry!
funEmojiResult:
*You rolled {emoji} and got *`{value}`*!*
You don't know what that means? Me too!
gifErr:
*Something went wrong while sending the GIF. Please try again later.*

{err}
lastFmNoUser:
*Please provide a Last.fm username.*
Example: `/lt username`
lastFmNoRecent: *No recent tracks found for Last.fm user* `{lastfmUser}`*.*
